SqlConnectionEncryptOption.summary: These options are used to control encryption behavior of the communication between the server and the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Implicit conversions have been added to maintain backwards compatibility with boolean behahavior for the <xref:Microsoft.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder.Encrypt%2A> property. When converting from a boolean, a value of `true` converts to <xref:Microsoft.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionEncryptOption.Mandatory%2A> and a value of `false` converts to <xref:Microsoft.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionEncryptOption.Optional%2A>. When converting to a boolean, <xref:Microsoft.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionEncryptOption.Mandatory%2A>, <xref:Microsoft.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionEncryptOption.Strict%2A> , and `null` convert to `true` and <xref:Microsoft.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionEncryptOption.Optional%2A> converts `false`.

Parse.summary: Converts the specified string representation of a logical value to its equivalent.
Parse.param: A string containing the value to convert.
Parse.returns: An object that is equivalent to contained in .
Parse.exception: Throws exception if provided is not convertible to type.

TryParse.summary: Converts the specified string representation of a logical value to its equivalent and returns a value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded.
TryParse.param: A string containing the value to convert.
An object that is equivalent to contained in . if conversion fails.
TryParse.returns: if the parameter was converted successfully; otherwise, .
TryParse.remarks: This method does not throw an exception if conversion fails.

Optional.summary: Specifies that TLS encryption is optional when connecting to the server. If the server requires encryption, encryption will be negotiated.

Mandatory.summary: Specifies that TLS encryption is required when connecting to the server. If the server doesn't support encryption, the connection will fail.

Strict.summary: Enables and requires TDS 8.0, TLS encryption to the server. If the server doesn't support TDS 8.0, TLS encryption, the connection will fail.

BoolToOption.param: The boolean value to be used for implicit comparison.

OptionToBool.param: The value to be used for implicit comparison.
OptionToBool.summary: Enables implicit converstion of a to a boolean. and convert to . converts to .
